880540.name: Runes of Magic – Welcome Gift
880540.description:
Pick up your free one-time welcome gift and enjoy a great start to your adventures in the world of Runes of Magic! Let the adventure begin with a fast mount, a loyal pet, and lots of useful boosts to help you level up and improve your skills

Contents:

Flying Rune Disk (7 Days)
Fly through the world of Taborea at a 75% faster speed.

Blue Note Cavy - Pet Egg (7 Days)
This faithful companion will stay by your side for 7 days and its skill will increase the collection of experience and talent points as well as your drop rate by 20% for 2 hours each day.

Backpack Ticket III (7 Days)
Enjoy more space in your inventory for 7 days.

Bank Space Scroll II (7 Days)
Profit from an additional bank space in tab II for 7 days.

5x Experience Potion
Level up faster thanks to 50% more experience points in combat! The effect will last 1 hour.

5x Skill Potion
Improve your skills in record time thanks to 50% more talent points in combat. The effect will last 1 hour.

5x Gathering Speed Increase Potion
Increase your gathering speed by 100% for 1 hour.

Important:
  • The items will be tied to the account you use to log into the game after purchase.
  • Then visit the shop in the game and open your depot to send the items to your inventory.
  • You can only purchase the DLC once per account.
880540.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
